document_data.name: Torvel Skydark
document_data.mainbody: '''Torvel Skydark''' was a hunter of the village of [[Maskyr's Eye]] in [[the Vast]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite polyhedron/57/The Everwinking Eye: At Home in Maskyr's Eye|21}}
document_data.Relationships: He was the brother of [[Torst Skydark]].
document_data.History: Torvel and Torst hailed from [[Thentia]] in the [[Moonsea North]], but both had settled in Maskyr's Eye by [[1357 DR]], where they took up work as hunters.
